known_issues: New tab draft behavior/layout differs from the 'in caffeine' draft; needs to match.

existing_features.title: Fix the "New Tab" draft experience so it matches the "in Caffeine" draft experience in layout, styling, and behavior (i.e., opening the app in a new browser tab should render the same UI theme, spacing, and component behavior as when viewed inside Caffeine).

projectName: Make the New Tab draft match the in-Caffeine draft
